items.title: Weekend PS5 game sale: Borderlands 4 all-time low, Death Stranding 2, Spider-Man 2, more
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering its best price to date on Borderlands 4 for PS5 and Xbox Series X|S. You’ll now find there regularly $70 physical edition marked down to $54.99 shipped – that’s slightly over 20% off and a new Amazon all-time low. While we did catch a notable deal on this one over Prime Day at $56, and a digital only offer at the same rate, today’s Amazon all-time low is ushering in the best price to date on the new Borderlands release. 

Alongside the Borderlands 4 deal, Amazon has now launched countdown clocks on several of its big hangover Prime Day PS5 game deals – today looks to be your last chance:

  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach $50 (Reg. $70)
